verses.verse: Prayer for Victory To the leader. A Psalm of David. (Ps 46.7, 11; 59.1; 91.14; 102.2) The LORD answer you in the day of trouble! The name of the God of Jacob protect you!
(Ps 3.4; 119.28) May he send you help from the sanctuary and give you support from Zion.
(Ps 51.19) May he remember all your offerings and regard with favor your burnt sacrifices. Selah
(Ps 21.2; 145.19) May he grant you your heartâ€™s desire and fulfill all your plans.
(1 Sam 1.17; Ps 9.14) May we shout for joy over your victory and in the name of our God set up our banners. May the LORD fulfill all your petitions.
(Ps 28.8; 41.11; Isa 58.9) Now I know that the LORD will help his anointed; he will answer him from his holy heaven with mighty victories by his right hand.
(2 Chr 32.8; Isa 31.1; 36.9) Some take pride in chariots and some in horses, but our pride is in the name of the LORD our God.
(Ps 37.24) They will collapse and fall, but we shall rise and stand upright.
Give victory to the king, O LORD; answer us when we call. (Gk: Heb give victory, O LORD; let the King answer us when we call)
